Are you sure to log out %s?
The network is unavailable, please check whether the network connection!
Your current city is %s, whether to synchronize the current city?
Your current city is %s, whether setting as the default city?
As the memory is already full,the application can not be activated.
Set default city for the first time, whether the automatic location?

The %s client is the China Meteorological Administration official weather software. Provided free of charge to over 3000 of the region and the world in key cities live weather, the next 7 days forecast, living and rich content video weather and weather warning function.
Currently only supports text messages to share
The new version is detected, but not fully compatible with the test, please choose carefully whether to upgrade.
Today is a special day, you want to say something...
Please input what you want to say
The data download fails, check whether the network is connected.
Please speak out a city name
Failure to locate, check the network connection status or GPS whether open.
3G/GPRS network, whether to continue to play? If you continue to play, the mobile phone traffic may consume.
3G/GPRS network, whether to continue to load the map? If you continue to load ,the mobile phone traffic may consume
The program will download the weather data, generate traffic, traffic fees charged by the operator.
Set the temperature standard, the default is centigrade
Settings the number of days of forecast information to shared
Set the city need to prompt the warning information
The boot automatically obtain the location of weather information.
Displays weather information on the Status bar.

" \u0009\u0009Thank you for using %s mobile client! \u00091. Authoritative data from CMA \u00092. Timely press of weather alert \u00093. Providing 28 weather index \u00094. Exclusive weather video Provider \u0009More functions are incoming in succession with you, providing close mobile weather service!
\u0009FAQ: \u00091. Add the weather desktop plugin \u0009Back to the desktop---long press more than 2seconds in the blank---choose” add widget” in MENU button---choose “china weather” application from list. Please make sure to leave enough place for widget.
\u00092. Modify the default city \u0009long press to choose you default city in the city list,also,you can modify the city name as your like, for example changing“Tianjin”to”my friend”.
\u00093. Video on demand \u0009You can get the latest weather video by downloading, it will cost you 2-5M flow, please choose your suitable network (wifi, 3G, GPRS) for watching.
\u00094. Changing background picture \u0009Press MENU button into “setting”Menu, then you can press “background modify” button to choose your favorite picture.
\u0009Client service \u0009You are welcome to contact us if you have opinions or Suggestions for us"
" \u0009%s \u0009Version:v %s \u0009Huafeng Meteorological Media Group. \u0009Copyright and all rights retained by Beijing Huafeng Innovation Network Technology CTL.ld "

"\u0009China Weathe TV \u0009China Weather Channel launched formally due to joined efforts of China Meteorological Administration, Huafeng Group, and the provincial meteorological departments. It bears public weather services vie professional digital channel, is an important platform to release meteorological disasters, early warning and forecast from the state level."

"\u0009Beijing Huafeng Meteorological Media Group Huafeng Meteorological Media Group is an enterprise owned by China Meteorological Administration. It bears important tasks like press release of meteorological disasters, early warning and forecast from the state level, public weather services vie media, popularization of meteorological science through television,etc. It is an indispensable part of public weather service.
\u0009Beijing Huafeng Innovation Network Technology Co., LTD founded at Jan. 2003, is a wholly owned subsidiary of Huafeng Group under the CMA. On the basis of the public weather service provided by Huafeng Group, we also committed to the new media business development, now people can get weather information in mobile phones, internet, video phone, vehicle system and TV etc. We strive to provide a professional, intimate product exceeding the expectations both in user experience and content for the public."

"\u0009Wind arrow is composed of the wind direction shaft and the barb. \u0009Wind direction shaft refers to the wind direction, usually represents by eight directions. \u0009The barb is the short line and the small triangle above,usually represents the size of the wind speed."
"零级无风炊烟上；一级软风烟稍斜； 二级轻风树叶响；三级微风树枝晃； 四级和风灰尘起；五级清风水起波； 六级强风大树摇；七级疾风步难行； 八级大风树枝折；九级烈风烟囱毁； 十级狂风树根拔；十一级暴风陆罕见； 十二级飓风浪滔天。"
Share weather through the ChinaWeatherTV software for everyone
Tomorrow hi temp is the same with today

"1. People shall take appropriate protective measures against substantially poorer air quality; 2. People shall reduce outdoor activities; children, the old and those with respiratory illnesses shall reduce outdoor activities."

"1. People shall take appropriate protective measures against substantially poorer air quality; 2. People shall avoid outdoor activities; children, the old and those with respiratory illnesses shall avoid outdoor activities."

"1. Governments and related authorities shall take preventive measures against the lightning according to their duties; 2. You should watch the weather closely and avoid outdoor activities as far as possible."
